DOC.brief_title: Healthy Kids & Families : Overcoming Social , Environmental Family Barriers Childhood Obesity Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: The study test impact community health worker ( CHW ) -delivered intervention aim help family overcome barrier childhood obesity prevention . Barriers include social , environmental , family issue . This intervention compare control condition consist community health worker ( CHW ) -delivered intervention aim help family improve positive parenting skill . The intervention use multiple delivery modality maintain novelty prevent attrition/burden . These include home visit , telephone contact , print ( literacy sensitive newsletter ) , social medium ( Facebook ) , community event . Parents child complete schedule assessment baseline , 6- , 12- , 18- 24-month follow-up . The Specific Aims : Aim 1 : To determine effectiveness intervention compare control condition child physical activity , healthy eating , BMI utilization build environment resource . Aim 2 : To determine effectiveness intervention compare control condition parent physical activity , healthy eating , BMI . Aim 3 : To examine potential scalability intervention guide RE-AIM ( Reach Effectiveness Adoption Implementation Maintenance ) model .
DOC.criteria: Eligible individual research study parents/guardians K6th grade child attend one 9 school great Worcester area . Parents child recruit parentchild dyad .
